extendedInfo.description: Visit Napa Valley is the OFFICIAL Android application for Napa Valley tourism. Download this FREE app for real-time access to everything you need to ensure a memorable visit to The Legendary Napa Valley. Sponsored by The Napa Valley Destination Council, Visit Napa Valley provides travelers with up-to-the-minute destination information and promotional offers for the region. Whether youâre planning an upcoming visit or youâre already in town, download Visit Napa Valley now for the following features: â¢ Valuable promotional offers from local businessesâ¢ GPS-enabled, interactive maps with point-of-interest category filtersâ¢ Real-time travel alerts and useful visitor newsâ¢ Current Napa Valley weatherâ¢ Current and future events occurring in The Napa Valleyâ¢ Favorites feature helps you save attractions and points of interest with the tap of a fingerâ¢ Search feature helps visitors quickly find specific information and offers

reviews.comment: Exceptionally poor.  Slow.  User experience is clunky.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Disappointing
reviews.comment: It\'s REALLY SLOW & GPS is way off. No list of wineries, just varietals. Can\'t find 2 varietals at once. Can\'t find ones close to each other. No photos & some have hardly any description. Hot News way out of date. Lots of advertising. Offers say show screen to merchant. Wow, how does that work when booking a hotel? The text is really hard to read, no paragraph breaks. I gave 2 stars but it really does not seem very useful. Even for free, I expect an app like this to be useful. As I said, disappointing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App for Napa Valley Visitors
reviews.comment: This application had everything I needed for a fun trip to wine country. The GPS navigation was helpful for finding which winery or restaurant to go to next. I found some good 2 for 1 tasting offers and deals. The events calender listed the concerts that were playing around the different towns. The connectivity (data speeds) in the Valley are pretty bad, but that isn\'t the app maker\'s fault. Verizon needs to build more cell towers in the area. Overall, 5 stars, thanks for making this free for visitors!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Site to slow
reviews.comment: It seems to be every thing you are looking for in napa, but the speed is to slow wich makes the app useless. Please improve speed
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Used offer to save almost $500 on my hotel!
